name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Regulations.gov
description: This is a repository of regulations.gov APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Regulations.gov
apis.description: Regulations.gov is a multi-agency website where citizens can view and comment on federal regulations and other agency actions that affect their daily lives. More than 35 federal departments and agencies participate in Regulations.gov, which is designed to encourage public involvement and citizen input.
